about_the_game:
THIS DLC DOESN'T CONTAIN ANY NEW CONTENT

This DLC will Unlock a Supporter Achievement and add a little Special Menu Animation.

This DLC has been suggested by loving fans who wished for a way to support this project and its updates.
I stand by the decision to keep the game completely Free, without microtransactions or ads.
If you decide to buy this DLC, I sincerely thank you for your generosity!

This is my first released game.
I created it with love and tried my very best to make it as good as I could with my current abilities.

ImpossiBowl was always supposed to be a learning resource more than anything. I've made thousands of mistakes in the process, but I tried to learn from each one in order to grow as a developer.

I am thankful to everyone who found the game and took the time to let me know they enjoyed it!
I hope I'll keep being able to create and share unique experiences!

name: ImpossiBowl - Supporter DLC

supported_languages: English, Italian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Russian, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, French
